text:
Stage II Lip and Oral Cavity Cancer
		                    Treatment of stage II lip and oral cavity cancer depends on where cancer is found in the lip and oral cavity.    Lip    If cancer is in the lip, treatment may include the following:         -  Surgery (wide local excision).    -  External radiation therapy and/or internal radiation therapy.         Front of the tongue    If cancer is in the front of the tongue, treatment may include the following:         -  Radiation therapy and/
